title: Prepositions of Place
description: Learn how to describe position: on, in, under, next to, behind.

subtopics.title: Common Prepositions
subtopics.description: Use basic words to talk about where things are.

examples.sample: The keys are on the table.

examples.explanation: Lower than something, covered by it.
examples.sample: The cat is under the chair.

subtopics.title: More Locations
subtopics.description: Describe positions relative to other objects.

examples.sample: The bank is next to the post office.

exercises.instruction: Describe the position using a preposition of place.
exercises.sentence: The school is the post office. (very close)
exercises.expected: The school is next to the post office.
